entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.Tests times out and gets killed #90834
  • Equals on EventId from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging check only ID #90831
  • ProfilingAPI: `ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds` deadlock on .NET 8.0-preview7 #90830
    8.0.0
  • Blittability check doesn't account for generic structs #90828
    9.0.0
  • Test failed: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_GetCounters #90803
  • [Mono] RuntimeTypeHandle.Equals seems to be broken in Release mode #90800
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Bad CastToType() in gtFoldExprConst() for a cast from long" #90798
  • [API Proposal]: Vector2, Vector3, Vector4 deconstruction and reconstruction #90795
  • Remove support for `--used-attrs-only` in illink #90793
    9.0.0
  • Incomplete type errors in lldb/gdb when when using clang-13 or newer #90791
  • System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch When measuring small time periods #90788
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `IJsonSerializable<TSelf>` #90787
    Future
  • Can't import native functions with 64bit parameters when using mono_add_internal_call #90786
    9.0.0
  • build.cmd is not compatible with pyenv-win #90782
  • [API Proposal]: Implement INumber<T> for vector types and operator interfaces for matrix types. #90781
  • AddMetrics can initialize MetricsSubscriptionManager multiple times #90779

Closed

  • JIT: win-arm64 native varargs doesn't correctly split incoming vectors between register and stack #89595
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [mono] System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.NodeFor - Operation is not supported on this platform #90806
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] WasmTestOnBrowser END OF WORK ITEM LOG: Command timed out, and was killed #86615
    9.0.0
  • [WASM] Add telemetry to track the use of WasmStripILAfterAOT #90671
    9.0.0
  • `UnrechableBlocksOptimizer` has bad performance #90717
  • Need add optimize Document for IlcScanReflection #90171
    Future
  • Consider shipping `RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute` as a downlevel assembly #79479
    Future
  • Trimmed InlineArrayAttribute breaks Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #90745
    8.0.0
  • Non-English output from `build.cmd` are displayed as gibberish #90069
  • NativeAOT EventPipe library needs to work correctly when EventSource support is enabled #82231
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly suffers memory leaks from compiled lambda expressions #82716
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] Expected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI. IsRunningOnCI is true but IsWorkloadWithMultiThreadingForDefaultFramework is false #90805
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] Runtime pack path doesn't match #90804
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    8.0.0
  • How can i enable promotionstructs opt flag ? #90784
  • cmove is not emitted for a simple expression #90017
    9.0.0
  • GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8013200B BEGIN: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b END: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b #90715
  • Port System.Security documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88575
    8.0.0
  • Question: xml escape/unescape characters #90477
  • Test failure JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #90723
    9.0.0
  • System.ArgumentException: Stream does not support reading. (Parameter 'stream') when reading from HttpMessageResponse.Content.ReadAsStringAsync() #88198
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Test simulated R2R bug #90837
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90835
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90833
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90832
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [WASM] Enable telemetry for WasmStripILAfterAOT #90827
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Events for IL methods without IL headers #90826
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90825
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Bump chrome version used for testing #90823
    arch-wasm
  • Case: The method has not been jitted yet #90821
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90819
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 #90813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [main] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 temporarily #90812
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Error out when NativeLib has EventPipe enabled #90811
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90810
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/8.0] HTTP & SSL Stress: Run nightlies against release/8.0 #90809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Update file owner for simd related files #90807
    area-Meta
  • Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90799
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90794
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introduce a switch to use FullOpts for cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Just running tests with new EH enabled on all platforms #90790
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Issue 90788 improvments to System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch #90789
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix win-arm64 native varargs ABI #90712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop skipping tests in installer pipeline on linux_x64 #89953
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0][manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #90648
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • [WASM] Enable telemetry for WasmStripILAfterAOT #90820
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve linker performance by avoiding IndexOf #90721
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90749
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [main] Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90756
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Disable BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow test #90818
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add note about IlcScanReflection to the native aot docs #90765
    documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #90750
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix imports for bump-chrome-version.proj #90822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Disable readytorun/GenericCycleDetection/Depth3Test #90802
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow test #90801
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Implement IStatefulPinnedMarshalling test marshallers #90685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix SuperPMI assertion call in `MethodContext::recGetHelperFtn()` #90778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make chrome version bumps for testing explicit, instead of automatic updates to latest #90772
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90797
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • HTTP & SSL Stress: Run nightlies against release/8.0 #90808
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [FileSystemWatcher] Linux - Null out 'watcher' variable when continuing to process events to prevent strong reference #90780
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Add a head merging transformation alongside the tail merging transformation #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Try enabling full trimming by default when not using blazor #89110
    area-Build-mono
  • Update 7.0 to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90767
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors after the kernel supporting SIMD. #90734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
